db:abstract.db:para: The MapItemGroup type is a container for map items.
This type was introduced in QtLocation 5.9.

db:listitem.db:para: MapItemGroup is part of QML Maps Plugin

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Its purpose is to enable code modularization by allowing the usage of qml files containing map elements related to each other, and the associated bindings.

db:note.db:para: The release of this API with Qt 5.9 is a Technology Preview.
